long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price History Extension - Price Tracker App for Flipkart & Amazon. 

Price History helps you to track price changes on Amazon and Flipkart. Price History & Tracker is an Chrome Extension for Price History Charts, Product tracking, Price Drop AlertsðŸ””, Buying Assistance, and AI Price Prediction.
Price History App allows you to check the historic price of products from all major e-commerce stores in India.

Amazon Price Tracker: Say goodbye to the confusing world of Amazon Lightning Deals and flash sales. Price History tracks everything, showing you the lowest price offered throughout the day. Find the perfect time to grab that smartphone or smart TV you've been eyeing!

Flipkart Price Tracker: Track prices on Flipkart, including exclusive deals and Big Billion Days offers. Price History helps you navigate the maze of discounts and ensure you get the best value for your money.

Price History: Usage & Benefits
E-commerce Stores change Prices for most Products every day. They also bring additional price drops via coupons, lightning deals, and flash sales. Price History Extension track all these Price & Offer changes and help users with meaningful pricing information. With Price History charts you can compare the product's lowest price of the day throughout the tracking period.

Features:
- All in one Price History & Price Tracker 
- Price Tracker for Amazon India & Flipkart
- No restrictions on Historical Price charts.
- Auto Check Lowest Offer from Other seller without need of additional clicks
- Find the correct cost with Price & Shipping comparison.

Why Choose Price History?
- Stop Overpaying: Price History puts you in control, helping you get the best possible price on every purchase.
- Smarter Shopping: Make informed decisions with detailed price data and AI-powered insights.
- Time Saver: Ditch the endless price-checking on different websites. Price History does it all for you!
- Never Miss a Deal: Set price drop alerts and get notified instantly when the price falls.
